channel.title: Homes on Welcome to Yuan Gao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Welcome to Yuan Gao's Homepage

item.description: Biography I am an Associate Professor of the Computational and Photogrammetric Vision Team (Captain), School of Artificial Intelligence, Wuhan University. Prior to that, I was a senior research scientist at Tencent AI Lab. I received Ph.D. degree in Electronic Engineering Department of City University of Hong Kong, during which I visited Center for Cognition, Vision, and Learning (CCVL) of UCLA. Before that, I obtained B.S. and M.S. degrees both from Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
